channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Guardium
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Guardium

item.title: CVE-2022-43908|2024-10-21T15:04:11.677Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 240903.

item.title: CVE-2023-47717|2024-06-04T17:26:34.287Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.

item.title: CVE-2023-47710|2024-06-04T17:26:36.057Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-05-11T13:18:21.646Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.title: CVE-2023-47712|2024-06-04T17:26:41.436Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges on the system due to improper permissions control. IBM X-Force ID: 271527.

item.title: CVE-2023-47709|2024-06-04T17:26:43.588Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 271524.

item.title: CVE-2023-47711|2024-07-23T21:00:38.139Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow an authenticated user to upload files that would cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271526.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 271524.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.

item.title: CVE-2023-47710|2024-08-02T21:16:43.555Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium
item.description: IBM Security Guardium 11.4, 11.5, and 12.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271525.
